name: ROOM4-1.WAD
description: in the first room4 i put a boss shooter that showed up in deathmatch - in this wad this feature has been removed for better playability - other than that it is the same as room4.wad cool large level for deathmatch - find the ?hidden? lifts to get more weapons and ammo - in the 1st and 2nd difficulity settings, i put plasma rifles and a couple of soul spheres
